publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6064 Stuart McMillan: Able2Sail—That the Parliament welcomes the work carried out by Able2Sail; notes that Able2Sail is a volunteer-run charity based in Inverkip Marina that provides free sailing to any disabled people, the families of disabled people and armed forces veterans; further notes the charity’s central belief that every individual should have the opportunity to sail a modern yacht; commends Able2Sail on its excellent work in the community, and wishes it every success in the future. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Anne McLaughlin*, Dave Thompson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Rob Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*

S3M-6064 Stuart McMillan: Able2Sail—That the Parliament welcomes the work carried out by Able2Sail; notes that Able2Sail is a volunteer-run charity based in Inverkip Marina that provides free sailing to any disabled people, the families of disabled people and armed forces veterans; further notes the charity’s central belief that every individual should have the opportunity to sail a modern yacht; commends Able2Sail on its excellent work in the community, and wishes it every success in the future. Supported by: Brian Adam, Joe FitzPatrick, Anne McLaughlin, Dave Thompson, Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Rob Gibson, Jackie Baillie, Sandra White, Bob Doris, Margaret Mitchell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*
